characters.story: "SHARE the load!" she commands sharply, removing and discharging cargo.
"YOU!" the imperial emperor commands sharply, controlling the royal queue to unload.
"YOU shall not pass!" she commands sharply, defending to withstand and resist.
The bird bends down drooping over its nest eggs - the letter opener threatens two drops of ova.
"Foo!" the fledgling sings cheerfully, hatching from nest eggs to incubate and emerge.
The tired mother bends drooping to offer her breast for milk and nursing.
"Foo?" she questions curiously, watching water float and drift in frivolous patterns.
"Fool?" the person questions curiously about the captive prisoner who was seized.
"Keen!" the minister lord sings cheerfully, the letter opener glinting with silver for the official.
"MAO!" he commands sharply, the letter opener cutting through shells in commerce and business.
"Loo?" she questions curiously, picking the pomegranate fruit that stays on the tree ready to burst.
"Hee?" he questions curiously with doubt and suspicion.
"AYE!" she commands sharply, as stones obstruct and hinder and block the path.
"Ning?" he questions curiously as ice and doubt combine to congeal and freeze solid.
She bends her fingers and furled brow down, exhausted from trying to simulate and draft an imitation.
"Ling?" the jewel questions curiously with orders - is it exquisitely tinkling and delicate?
"Ling?" the small metal bell questions curiously - will it chime and ring?
"Ling?" the person questions curiously if the orders make them a clever, witty actor performer.
The weary mountain climber bends down drooping on the mountain range ridge with his collar pulled up.
He bends down to lift the heavy tree bucket - a barrel toilet from the old days.
"SONG!" she commands sharply, using words from the chop-rack to read aloud and recite poetry.
The water bends and surges, gushing courageously like a spurt.
The wooden leg bends down drooping but eagerly and enthusiastically leaps forward with courage.
"JUNE test!" he commands sharply about the exam paper scroll.
"Queen!" she sings cheerfully, drawing a ring loop in the pen.
She bends her fingers down, exhausted from rolling up the curly coiled hair.
"JUNE exams!" the tired person commands sharply, worn out and weary from the exam paper fatigue.
"FAN club!" he commands sharply about the model standard and exemplar style.
"YOU want grudges?" she commands sharply with resentment, complaint and blame in her heart.
The path bends down drooping in a winding, curved meandering way.
"ONE joint!" he commands sharply, gripping his wrist where the hand mailbox connects to his body part.
The woman bends down politely, tactful and gentle with courteous mailbox manners.
He bends down to pick up the stone bowl dish vessel from the ground.
The words bend down drooping in sly, tricky, cunning deceit.
"GWAY!" he commands sharply, forcing the foot to kneel, bow and prostrate.
"You?" she questions curiously if the zipper car tool represents popular public opinion.
